name: FacetStats

fields.name: count
fields.documentation: The number of documents that have the specified facet {@link #value} at the given {@link #name} path.

fields.name: name
fields.documentation: The name of the facet field, typically matching a path in the document that was annotated with {@link Facet}.

fields.name: value
fields.documentation: The specific value of the facet for which the count applies.
